s.text: The 4,100 member provincial police force, more a sort of regional FBI than state troopers, accepted the scathing criticism delivered by a public inquiry last month and will undertake sweeping reforms, reports Monique Beaudin in the Montreal Gazette . "We are taking this very seriously," said SQ chief Florent GagnŽ.
After lunch, I launch myself into a low Earth orbit to battle giant space monkeys from Neptune."
